name: BiVERSE
description:
BiVERSE is a fun and simple puzzle-platformer game where you play with a character that lives in two different dimensions / alternate universes.  

This game has been developed by an individual developer from Xerise Studio in Unity. Please visit our website for more fun games! Let's be in touch.

بايفرس (ثنائي الأبعاد) هي لعبة من نوع puzzle-platformer, حيت تقوم ياللعب بشخصية قادرة على السفر ما بين الأبعاد

تم تطوير اللعبة من قبل فرد من ستوديو تطوير الألعاب Xerise

This game has also been developed as a submission for Zanga9 Game jam!
